#Dt

More than 20 accidents and two victims: a report of GIBDD in Sahalina for 27 December
This morning, 28 December, in the Sahali region, the SIGHD clarified information on road traffic accidents recorded over the past 24 hours on 27 December. For example, 29 accidents involving two victims were recorded for the last environment in the region. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
Today, 10:44
Parker driver launched a frontal collision on the Korsak track
Two people were injured in a frontal accident on a Corsakov track. According to the Regional ISISD, the crash occurred on the 24-mile road at 6 p.m. on Wednesday, 27 December.
Today, 10:27
Toyota Wish driver crashed the South Sahalinsk road on 26 December
On the eve, on 26 December, a two-infect accident took place in South Sahalinsk. As it has become known, a 43-year-old driver on Toyota Wish failed to manage, traveled to the counter and ran into Toyota Corolla. As a result of the accident, drivers were injured.
Yesterday, 11:16
More than 110 violations of the DPA and three victims: the Shalina report of GIBD on 26 December
This morning, 27 December, in the Sahali region, IHD clarified information on road traffic accidents recorded over the past 24 hours on 26 December. For example, 26 accidents involving three victims were recorded in the region for the last Tuesday. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
Yesterday, 10:40
Gazeli driver ran into a greyder on a hill track.
The car crash took place on 26 December on the South Sahalinsk-Holmsk road. The Ghazeli driver lost control and flew into special equipment. One person was injured as a result of the accident.
Yesterday, 10:21
More than 25 accidents and two victims: 25 December report of GIBDD on Sahalina and Kurilah
This morning, 26 December, in the Sahali region, IHD clarified information on road traffic accidents recorded over the past 24 hours on 25 December. For example, 26 accidents were recorded in the region for the last Monday. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
26 December, 10:50
The drunk driver triggered an accident with two victims in the North-Kuril district
On the eve, on 25 December, an incident involving an alien took place in the North-Kuril region. It has been reported that a drunk 35-year-old driver on Honda H-RV failed to control and moved out of the carriageway. Two passengers were injured as a result of the accident.
26 December, 10:15
A drunk 60-year-old driver triggered an accident on the South Sahalinsk-Korsakow road
On Saturday, 23 October, a two-infect accident took place in the Korsak district. As it has become known, a 60-year-old drunk driver on Toyota Land Cruiser went to the counter strip and ran into Subaru Outback. As a result of the accident, Toyota driver was injured.
25 December, 11:39
More than 30 casualty accidents: report of GIBD on Sahalina and Kurilah on 21 December
This morning, 22 December, in the Sahali region, IHD clarified information on road traffic accidents recorded over the past 24 hours on 21 December. For example, 35 accidents were recorded in the region for the last Thursday. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
22 December, 10:46
Young Toyota Mark II hit a pedestrian on the Troiccoe Trace.
On the eve, on 20 December, the 21-year-old Toyota Mark II driver was driving on the Troiccoe road, Novotroitzkoya, failed to control and travelled to a 59-year-old man standing on the side. As a result of the crash, the pedestrian was injured. Checking.
21 December, 13:27
The bus almost hit a pole on a pedestrian as a result of a crash in South Sahalinsk
This morning, 21 December, a passenger bus accident took place at the Regional Centre. The moment of confrontation at the crossroads of Komsomol and Polybaric was caught in the surveillance camera. The driver ' s neglect and non-compliance with a safe distance appear to be blamed.
21 December, 09:14
Sahalina was told about the safety of children and drivers in the new year ' s holidays.
How is it right to behave on the trawls in the winter, and what is it to draw your parents' attention when they walk the streets?
20 December, 16:50
The crash on Komsomol-- the victory in South Sahalinsk hit the surveillance cameras.
This morning, 20 December, an accident involving three vehicles took place in the Regional Centre. The clash on the street of Komsomol and the Victory Prospect was hit by traffic surveillance cameras. It appears that the guilt of the incident is badly visible and negligent.
20 December, 11:36
More than 15 casualty accidents: report of GIBDD in Sahalina on 19 December
This morning, 20 December, in the Sahali region, IHD clarified information on road traffic accidents recorded over the past 24 hours on 19 December. For example, 16 accidents were recorded in the region for the last Tuesday. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
20 December, 10:51
Safety rules on the road during the winter period: Sakhalin residents ' memoranda
The State Inspectorate requests drivers to be very careful and careful in difficult weather conditions. Snow sludges, severe bleak winds, methel can negatively affect road safety and increase the risk of accidents.
20 December, 10:34
The court sentenced a motorcycle attendant to three years of colony for drunken accidents in Poroniske
The Regional Court upheld the sentence of a 22-year-old resident of Poronaiska who in May 2021 initiated an accident on his motorcycle. As a result of the accident, the motorcycle ' s passenger suffered serious health damage.
20 December , 01:10
Toyota Crown driver entered Toyota Land Cruiser Prado in South Sudan on 18 December
On the eve of 18 December, a serious two-inoma accident took place in South Sahalinsk. According to the Regional Directorate of GIBD, Toyota Crown driver went to the forbidden signal of the light phomore, after which he ran into Toyota Land Cruiser Prado. The SUV has suffered injuries.
19 December, 10:14
One aggrieved and 39 accidents: report of GIBDD in Sahalin for 18 December
This morning, 19 December, relevant data on the road environment in Sahalin were reported to the Regional Directorate of GIBDD on the last Monday. The State inspectors registered 39 accidents, one of which was injured. Sakh.online publishes relevant agency data.
19 December, 09:59
Kamaz drove a car in the Korsak district
The accident took place on 15 December at 10:30. On the South Sahalinsk track, Korsakow, a 55-year-old KAMAZ driver failed to control and crashed into the Hyundai side and drove to the pedestrian. A 52-year-old man was injured. Specialists are checking.
December 18th, 16:30
Toyota Land Cruiser Prado hit a pedestrian in the Korsak district on 15 December
On Friday, 15 December, a 52-year-old woman driving Toyota Land Cruiser Prado was driving on the South Sahalinsk-Korsak road, failed to manage and travelled to a 33-year-old man who was on the road in a direction. As a result of the crash, the pedestrian was injured. Checking.
18 December, 14:02
